# ğŸ” Semantic Search with Generative AI

A production-ready Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) system that combines the power of vector embeddings and Large Language Models for intelligent document search and question answering. Built with FastAPI, Weaviate, and OpenAI, this system enables semantic understanding of your documents and provides AI-powered answers based on your custom knowledge base.

## ğŸŒŸ Key Features
- **Semantic Search**: Advanced meaning-based document retrieval
- **Question Answering**: AI-powered responses using your document context
- **Production Ready**: Containerized with Docker, Kubernetes support
- **Scalable Architecture**: Microservices design with vector database
- **Developer Friendly**: REST API, comprehensive docs, example code
